text_review: What a wonderful and beutiful little gem in the heart of Saigon.; First of all, it is a bit hidden and hard to find from the street.; But once you found it by going up a staircase and walked 10 meters will you find …

If you like bowls with vegetables or fruits, I recommend that for you.; The restaurant is above a motorbike shop, you have to go through there and go upstairs. The selection for the vegetables is good, but no that good for …

Really nice English speaking staff. She was helpful and helped us picking the ingredients for our first time trying Poke. The ingredients are fresh enough and the proportion is as you can see, huge. We asked for and they happily added more …
Great food and nice chill place.; ; To get to the place you walk into a motorcylce parking space then a few flight …

It's a cute place hidden in one of Saigon's apartment buildings. Everything is super clean and there are some comfortable seats. I haven't tried their poke but I had a pitaya bowl. It was tasty but I feel like some extra toppings would make it even better. The smoothie part was frozen - basically like a sorbet.
150k for a bowl.; ; Easy to order with a lot of free reign for what your want. Cool quiet lounge-y …

One of the hidden treasures of the city. Once you arrive to the address, you must walk into a tiny motorbike parking garage room towards a grand staircase at the back. Then just walk up a floor & you'll be outside again, you will see signs …

Always amazing poke here! You can make a vegan poke bowl by choosing tofu and sesame-soy dressings with the right toppings. So delicious! It’s 120k vnd for a vegetarian/vegan bowl (150k for a regular bowl).

Amazing place. You make your own poke bowl with a base of rice, salad or both, then add raw fish and lots of other ingredients and sauces. Everything is so fresh and delicious and very reasonably priced. Staff is also very friendly and helpful. If I lived in HCMC I would definitely be a regular here.

Very very nice place, it seams to be hosted in an apartment. The girls are very gentle and patient with us foreigners. The food is excellent and served best. Highly recommended. The place is a little bit hidden and not easy to find and the entrance might discourage, but do not hesitate and reach the first floor...you won't regret it 2 …

Most amazing poke bowl ever! So delicious! And a great variety to chose from. The staff was really friendly, helpful and spoke English perfectly. The restaurant is really cute just a little bit hidden. I will definitely come back!
Fantastic poke bowl with about 20 kinds of toppings and 7 sauce options. Every bowl custom made for you. 45k tete craft beer from  6-8pm too. Left stuffed for 150k dong.
Excellent quality food and good topping variety with a great atmosphere. Highly recommend. …

Món ăn không quá lạ nhưng cách kết hợp thì độc đáo và rất hợp miệng, nhiều lựa chọn về chủng loại rau cá topping. Không gian đẹp và yên tĩnh khá hợp để đi cặp đôi hoặc nhóm bạn nhỏ. Gửi xe dưới lầu 10k/chiếc.
Excellent place! Super delicious food! Don't skip this place while visiting Ho Chi Min
Great little restaurant tucked away on 1st floor accessed via a flight of stairs inside a building. Delicious fresh Poke, friendly staff and a nice chilled atmosphere!

Wow! Such a special spot. It just oozes style and good vibes. Tucked away in a unique location on the 1st floor of a residential building, this beautiful little Poke shop serves a variety of super fresh ingredients with which you can build …
Little hidden gem with absolutely mindblowing food and interior. Loved it. Paid 175.000 for a full bowl and drink.
For sure the best poke in town. While the others are too dry, these ones are perfect. Good service. Nice atmosphere.
Ngon, tốt cho sức khỏe, giá hơi cao, diện tích hơi nhỏ
Amazing fresh bowl - had the one with salmon! Also cool to chill or work in a quiet environment. Keep it up!
Đồ ăn hơi mắc, 150k 1 phần basic
Food is good but i myself consider price is above average
Incredibly good and healthy food, fabulous hidden and quiet location and Tê Tê craft beer on draft. Don't miss it!
hard to find but it worth to get it because it  is so delicious and health
Love this place! They has super healthy food and passionate staff.
6$ fantastic food. Delicious.

The poke bowls are amazing!! It's a little hidden gem, literally hidden on the first floor above a parking garage for motorbikes. Once find your way tjere you will not be disappointed. The ordering process couldn't be easier, it's laid out …
A good bowl of Poke. Delicious, fresh, fully filled bowl. Would go again!
Nice staffs and delicious poke bowl.
Great Hawaiian style poke spot. Head through the alley and up to the first floor.

Very good japanese sushi salad with quite the Poke style as everywhere else. Price is a bit higher compared with local spendings but a good match for expats who would like to get something familiar to foods in Poke elsewhere.
Cozy. Healthy. Affordable for a nice brunch or a meal

This place is great! It's a more modern style poke than the traditional Hawaiian style I grew up eating almosy every day. The selection of fish is always fresh with lots of delicious sauces and toppings to choose from. I had the tuna and …
Really good food. You can choose what to put in your bowl, there are a lot of choices. The place is small and crowded during lunch so you should come early for seats.
I love poke it fresh it delicious and it healthy; - the price is about 7usd can make you want to go once a week but the portion is quite big
Amazing,fresh,friendky and super cool location. Hidden away and I hope to keep this place my personal secret  …
Great, friendly service. Fresh and delicious food. Definitely not my first Poke bowl and won't be my last.
Món ăn ngon, không gian đẹp!!!
Great little gem in the heart of Saigon. They serve healthy salads called Poke and they also have smoothie bowls!!!
150k for as much toppings as you want (and 2 scoops of raw salmon/tuna/tofu, which I found enough), loved it!
Awesome place to get a salad. Staff is super helpful and the portions are big.; Can really recommend!!
So so so yummy and colorful loaded with delicious and healthy toppings! The salmon is tasty.
Amazing!
Nice concept in a small cosy place. Make up your own healthy salad!
amazing poke bowl. unbelievable food and great service.
Good place for healthy food but quite pricey
Thức ăn dinh dưỡng, phù hợp với sức khỏe nhiều người ăn kiêng , ăn chay .
Quán dễ thương, đồ ăn ngon, giá ổn
I love this place, enjoyed foods bery much, i ate here many times
A nice place and very nice staffs
Fresh but expensive
Ăn ngon, rất thich ăn kiểu như vậy
Great space, great healthy options. Poke Saigon has become one of my staples!
Very tasty food with great selection of toppings
You must visit this place!!
Cosy atmosphere, nice food
Interesting rice bowls and the tasted good!
Delicious salad and rice
Look for the sign out front. You won't be disappointed!
It is always a delight having the real food here!
The food is fresh and delicious also polite
Fantastic place, must try when in Saigon.
Great place. Delicious foods
Poke in Saigon. Eat it.
A complete healthy and tasty poke bowl....

DELICIOUS!!! nothing more to say.

Choose your favorite ingredients from steps 1 to 5 to complete your own ball. 1 dish/150,000 dong. Drinks other than water are 50,000 dong. The music, the atmosphere of the shop, and the taste are delicious!

1st visit to Vietnam and of course I go to see the best poke in Vietnam.. the decor is pleasant I love the terrace, as it is quite early I would come back for dinner for now I contented myself with their happy hour 1 buy 1 ..and I fell for …
Very nice place to have lunch. Very friendly staff who take the time to explain how it works. Good choice for a tasty healthy meal. It's a bit hidden but it's worth looking for.

Amazing place where we had some of the best food we sampled in Saigon the ingredients were super fresh and prepared with care.the staff is super attentive to your needs speaks excellent English. they saw that I was sad because of a recent …
Absolutely delicious! So healthy and fresh. They were careful with mine and my friend’s dietary requirements (Vegetarian & vegan) and you felt good after eating it. …

Great food, healthy style with reasonable price!; It’s located at the 1st floor of the building, so a little bit difficult to find. But trust me, when you see it, it’s like a bright garden lying inside an old …

Husband and I are from California we live in Taiwan now. While on vacation in Saigon, we had the best poke bowl, ever. It doesn’t get better than this. The flavor is perfect, the price is beyond reasonable. I wish we had one of these in …

Quán nhỏ xinh nằm ở tầng 2 chung cư ở Lý Tự Trọng, món ăn ngon, cá hồi tươi, nhiều loại sốt và topping để lựa chọn. Nên thử sốt mè dễ ăn hoặc mayo cay, topping có xoài, đậu nhật, trứng cút ngâm tương rất ngon. Không gian quán siêu xinh, tạo …
The rice and salad is great and fresh! A big portion of bowl, definitely good for a guy, with stomach people, suggest to share with two. High recommend

I struggle with how anyone could give this less than 5 stars. It is great food at a great price with friendly service. You pick whether you want salad, rice or brown rice or mix for a base. You pick 2 seafood, and any mix of other fresh …

Subway and Chipotle visited Hawaii and decided to use the freshest ingredients to make Poke bowls. Start with rice or salad or both, then choose your protein, then sauces then toppings. The toppings option is a little overwhelming at first, …
This place is in an old charming building in the heart of town. It's brightly lit and plays cool music. There are many many options on how you can configure yout salad. …

The cutest hidden gem in district 1 for gourmet poke bowls! While located on the first floor of a run down building, this spot is super chic. The staff speaks English and the food is delicious. For 150k VND, you pick your 2 scoops of …

First Poke and it did not disappoint! Clean and fresh ingredients high quality and made quickly. Beautiful little hidden spot on the second floor with kind staff that had great customer service skills and touched base with us and other customers was nice to see. Worth the dollars for sure will be back again soon :)
Delicious! Cozy atmosphere. I like it a lot. But one portion is a bit too much for me. I wish they serve a smaller bowl.
Poke rất tươi và ngon, Pitaya cũng vậy. Không gian của quán đẹp và rất mát mắt nhưng bất tiện là không có dịch vụ trả tiền qua thẻ.

This is a hidden gem in the city. Located on the second floor of a residential building that you need to access via a garage with 40 motorbikes and a tiny stairway. This is probably the best Poke I have had. …
Subway style choose your own pokebowl. Choose rice, toppings, sauces etc. £5, 150000d. Delicious and filling. Ingredients taste very fresh and staff are incredibly kind and friendly. Worth the trip.

Amazing and delicious poke bowls! Hidden away up a sketchy stair case inside a scooter garage, you would never expect such a gem being hidden away. Lovely service with great English skills helped us get a nice bowl  …

Always fresh and has a variety of toppings to choose from. After trying poke at a few different places, I still think Poke Saigon is the best. This location is quite small and cozy, but very nice nonetheless.
Amazing Poke and really nice and friendly staff! Probably the best poke I've ever had. A modern, calm place to eat.; Not the easiest to find as it is on the first floor.

Delicious and nutritious options. If you don't feel like constructing your own bowl, there are recommendations that you can choose from.  Pictured: California and Hawaiin. Prices are on the board (ranges from 150k and up)
Beautiful and delicious bowls, 150k each. Wonderful and friendly staff who walked us through to make our bowls. The location is so cute too!

The place overall is nice! However, the staff kinda has a discriminative attitude towards my friend, whom used Vietnamese to order food. Later, she told me that the staff has a certain attitude towards her probably she used Vietnamese to order instead of using English, which I amnot sure to be honest. The food is great, though!

Been living in HCMC for a year now and this place is legit yummy and safe.  I’ve gotten food poisoning a couple times from raw fish in this city so I’m definitely on the sensitive side and I’ve never had a problem here! 150k isn’t cheap but I don’t recommend eating any cheap raw fish while visiting
Hidden away upstairs and down the hall, this place is super cute. It’s chipotle style fast casual make your own poke. The staff are really friendly and the food is delicious.

I love poké & this charming little shop (tucked safely away from the hustle & bustle) did not disappoint! Ingredients were all fresh & offered great combination. They have a nice range of poke/fish items & the largest selection of toppings …

Hidden gem! If you’re craving for a good pokebowl, this is a must-go. Very good quality and friendly good english speaking staff. A bit hard to find but it’s totally worth it. You can put unlimited toppings and they also have nice juices and pitaya/smoothie bowls  …
Vegan and vegetarian options available; I only came here to keep my vegan gf happy but I absolutely loved it.; Construct your dish yourself (think Subway on crack, but no bread) …
Taste of Hawaii in Saigon. Very fresh and delicious. Vegetarian friendly. Highly recommended.
such good food and great service. just 150.000 VND for a bowl (drink not included). I definitely recommend this place! the picture is of "the california"
Lovely fresh food, lots of flavours. A beautiful meal and wonderful service. Very friendly staff who will guide you through building your perfect poke.
The best place for poke and the cutest place of the city. If you go there you are sure eating high quality dishes and extremely fresh ingredients. Enjoy!
Very delicious in my kind of taste and the best thing ist, all bowls can be gluten- and lactosefree.
The food are fresh, most of things are healthy, a great choice. The staffs are welcoming and helpful in explaining for new comer like me everything
Perfect poke with good service! Staff can speak good English too! 90% of their clients are foreign!
Super clean place with great healthy food and lovely people! A nice place to escape from the busy streets.
Excellent Poke place. Very quiet and nice. Fresh tasty and healthy meal. Rare combination of this three features in one thing.
The best poke I ate! Very nice stuff, polite and helping! Really recommend
Very tasty  Staff is great and speak English very well. Definitely going back next time I go to Saigon. …
Perfect : delicious, balanced, healthy, good quality, clean and quiet environment, wonderful staff, etc.
Delicious light meal, you can choose what you want here. By the way, you need to find the store first before you eat XD
Các thành phần tươi ngon, hấp dẫn và vừa vị.
It's on the 2nd floor. Go through the bikes parked at the front and take a flight of stairs at the end.; The sides are unlimited, you can ask for as much as the bowl can hold!

The place is a bit hard to find, but the premises are quiet and lovely decorated. The staff is English-speaking, very friendly and will help you create your own bowl with rice or salad base, various sea food and toppings. The price is a bit …

We were impressive with this concept in another building and wanted to discover the second one. The food was still delicious as if we could eat everyday. The staffs speak English perfectly and are really polite. 150k for one bowl with everything you can choose, fresh and healthy!
Delicious pokebowls at a reasonable price. Lot of options for your bowl as well.
Delicious poké bowls and super friendly service  …

I had never had poke bowls before coming here... It was so good. So fresh, ample size. I asked for heaps of toppings and they just loaded if up. Shrimp was a highlight of my bowl. If I was her in Saigon longer I'd be back to eat again :D

Had lunch here and it was very good. A lot of different ingredients to chose from, rice, salad or mix of both as base, salmon and tuna, natural or spicy, shrimps, octopus, etc. and a variety of different dressings. …

The place is a bit hard to find (go up through the parking garage) but the food is very good! You are free to customize your pokebowl any way you want and there are many options available. If you're unsure about what to get the staff is very helpful and willing to make some recommendations. Enjoyable place all in all.
Unbelievable good bowl, was better than in Hawaii! And a lot cheaper ;)
Great place. Great and fresh food. The staff are super nice and speak great English.

Simply delicious meal! The staff were very friendly and spoke English very well. They were happy to explain and give recommendations based on my preferences. It's more than enough food, and only AUD$9. The food is fresh, colourful and tastes amazing. Air con, WiFi, cute couches and benches,  what more could you want?

Amazing staff, relaxing place. The concept, the quality of meals, or drinks that are suggested just WoW, really simple but so good, love it this is for the reason i went back after a friend show me the place for a lunch. Really amazing idea, quality, staff all match together for a reasonnable price. Keep going, will be back, YummY
Our first time trying poke and it was delicious! The ingredients are so fresh and the staff is super friendly. Great English too! The smoothie bowl is also yummy!

Truly a wonderful place with AMAZING attentive staff, delicious food and a cool environment! I will certainly be back. We’re vegans and the vegan options was perfect! Shout out to Mai Linh for making the whole experience even better :)

Great food and many selections to choose from. The salmon was very fresh, and the wasabi Mayo had a good kick to it. Although a little hard to find, it's definitely worth the visit. Super friendly staff.
Omg!! So delicious! And the serving size is soooo generous. Very fresh, def be back daily until I leave! The girls are all so friendly and gave me tips on places to go. 10/10 for sure!
Beautiful little place, fresh ingredients and amazing customer service: thank you !

We have spent a very good moment at this place. The bowls are very fresh and delicious. Special thanks to Thanh the lady who served us tonight. She explained to us the menu carefully and was very nice
Super delicious fresh food and amazing staff!!

Such an amazing little find just out of the main tourist attractions, a nice outdoor area to sit and get away from the horns of HCM streets. The food was delicious and good sized portions and the staff were incredible at walking me through …

Went there after reading tripadvisor ratings but when we saw the place ran away imediately. Through a motorbike parking, up the stairs to the first floor down a corridor with several doors there was a room with some tables. 2 persons were …
Fresh and delightful bowls and a super friendly staff
I love this place. Chic and chill. Healthy delicious food. They're located upstairs, level 2 even though the sign on ground floor says located at level 1. Under 200,000vnd per bowl
Absolutely delicious! Very decently priced as well! Best food I had in a long long time. Will probably go back again tonight.
Delicious and great value! Best poke bowl I have possibly ever had. Clean and airy too, highly recommend!

I wanted to add my 5 stars, and everything I wanted to say is more eloquently written in the other reviews: delicious food, super-friendly staff, beautiful space, a bit difficult to find.  So worth it. Such a great experience.
- Cửa hàng nằm trên tầng 1. gửi xe ở dưới đất bất tiện.; - 7h30 tối mà 1 số món đã hết. Oder xong 10p sau lại báo hết tiếp mà ko có lời xin lỗi. …

The food is absolutely amazing, the place so cozy and friendly (even if it is a little tricky to find as it is at the 2 floor of a building that seems a parking) and the staff probably is the best thing, welcoming and helpful! Must try!
Great place, super friendly staff. The gentleman who served us told us this is the better location out of the two as you can sit down here to eat, the other one is very busy.; Had free WiFi too.

So tasty...so many toppings and flavors makes it so cerebrally satisfying. The 2 girls there Hue and especially Vy are so enthusiastic and positive. They speak English very nicely, which seems to be rare in HCM. Interior is chic and very …
Hidden on the first floor after you pass the scooter garage. Amazing Poke bowls reasonably priced. Everything fresh and delicious. The staff speaks english!
As a tourist i was quite comprehensive about eating here as it is not quite authentics. But this is hands down the best food i ate here in vietnam. I bet this is one of the best poke in the world
Excellent service with high quality grade tuna, shrimp, and octopus. It's quickly becoming our favorite spot to eat in Saigon.
Focuses a lot in foreigners, so if you're a Viet, you'll get treated a little... "less". But hey, otherwise it's great for travelers, expats, foreigners: food is never bad, good services.
Food was really good and price was good. Staff was super helpful and nice. I’m vegan and gluten free and they knew exactly what I could and couldn’t have.
This was the best poke I have ever tried. Delicious! Thank you. And also very polite and friendly staff here. Definitely recommend this place.
bit pricey but staff is very helpful and for the fixed bowl price you are free to choose from all ingredients they offer which is super cool
I’ve tried many poke restaurants and this is the best I’ve ever had. It looks just like the pictures, they give very generous portions and the atmosphere is pleasant.
Excellent customer service. They automatically gave me a free drink as an apology for making me wait without even prompted. Oh, and the food's great too.
Fresh poke ingredients, great variety, lovely staff, cute little seating space, oh and they deliver to. My go-to for comfort lunches, any day.
Super tasty!! I got a vegan bowl and the staff was pretty aware of what was vegan or not. They were super helpful and friendly.
An amazing gem in Saigon, not easy to spot but that adds to its charm. Fresh bowls of awesome flavours, the perfect stop for lunch.
Best poke bowl I've ever had!

Delicious and fresh poke bowls! The place is beautiful and cozy, and the staff is helpful and super nice! Definetely recommended!
Excellent experience at this place, the personal was friendly and at ease with speaking english, the place was comfortable, and the food really good and fresh! I highly recommand it!
Friendly, English speaking staff, excellent poke bowls! (150k for regular bowl at Jan 2019)
super fresh and friendly staffs. good thing if you’re a sashimi lover! they dont accept cards though

The entrance is quite difficult to find, but there is a stylish store at the top of the stairs. …

Incredible discovery. Seeing that I didn't know the concept, the three smiling young girls helped me with great pleasure, even coming to pick me up outside when a place in the cooler became available. Food level: explosive mix of flavors, from fresh produce. I recommend :) !
Incredibly fine and freshly prepared poke bowls (with very friendly support in selecting the ingredients)!; The selection of ingredients is huge and everything is of very high quality. The …
We had lunch here at about one on a Saturday. We managed to snag the last table! …
Delicious tasty food.; The staff is very friendly and speaking English perfect.; The only thing that not nice is the entrance and the stairs. But after this a …
Spacious, beautifully decorated store. Coconut 40k VND. Their main business is poke. Cafe and drinks are complementary business. Eco friendly utilities: coconut bowls, grass straws. …

It's very good! Best poke bowl I've tried. The price is decent (mine total is around VND 200k) and they are generous with the portion. All ingredients are fresh from the carbs, protein salmon down to the veggies. You can feel it that they prepare it with heart! Definitely will come back again!
So good, do not hesitate to go.  Best poke bowl in town.  Walk in the garage, go up on flight of stairs, it is at the end of the hall.  The girls are nice the food is great.  Enjoy!

Great poke, wonderful staff! We had the California poke adjusting a bit to our preferences and it was really yummy. The girls working there are really friendly, nice and speak great English. Highly recommend it!

Quán ăn Healthy các bạn nhé. Phối hợp dinh dưỡng hợp lý. Có đầu tư. Khung cảnh yên tĩnh trên lầu 1 của một chung cư cũ, trang trí xinh xắn. Chỉ có buồn là bạn phục vụ cao giọng quá, chắc hôm nay cảm xúc biến động. Mong quán duy trì tinh thần cho khách hàng mới ghé ăn cơm. Cảm ơn.

Very tasty and quality poke bowls in the heart of Saigon! We were very impressed with the quality of ingredients, especially since the price was much lower than comparable poke at home. The staff were very friendly and helpful as well! The location is a couple of floors up in the building and there is no elevator, so keep that in mind.

It’s just the best!  Anyone can eat here. Anyone can afford it. And Im sure everyone will enjoy it! I absolutely love it!  always fresh ingredients, very friendly stuff, cozy atmosphere. I can have Poke bowl every day because of how good …

Quán ăn healthy với base là gạo lứt hoặc salad. Một phần trung bình 160k với topping thoải mái gồm nhiều loại rau củ, trái cây như xoài, bưởi hay thanh cua, gừng ngâm, đậu cùng lựa chọn cá và bạch tuột. Có khẩu phần chay. An unbelievable poke bowl for the cost. The ingredients and fish are fresh, the bowls are very pretty and the unlimited toppings is a huge plus. It is a lot of food for only about $7 USD and the eatery is very comfortable. Highly recommend.

Fresh and delicious food! I came at lunchtime and had to wait in line for a long time as they were preparing lots of Grab orders. I was impressed by the price (180 000 dong) given you can choose unlimited toppings for free. Very worthwhile!

Quán xinh xắn dễ thương. Cơm ở đây siu ngon mà còn healthy nữa. Cơm trộn ăn rất vừa miệng, nhiều rau mà ăn không hề ngán. Nhất là có cá hồi sốt cay ăn cùng cơm ngon lắm, thêm xoài và các topping khác đều rất hợp miệng. Một tô vậy ăn xong no căng cả buổi luôn. Vừa ngon, vừa no vừa tốt sức khoẻ luôn nè!!!

10/10 food and service. Ingredients are so fresh and taste delicious considering they’re so healthy! I love the way you order to build your own bowl as I can be fussy with food. I will 100% be back several times before the end of my trip.

I love Poke Saigon! The food is so fresh and I feel great when I leave. It's also delicious. The bowls are well priced, the service is always great, and the food always tastes delicious. I'm never disappointed when I visit.

Đồ ăn ngon, sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện rất tận tình tư vấn cho khách. 1 tô nhìn nhỏ nhưng ăn no xỉu  Recomend mọi người nên thử, đúng là tiền nào của đó  …

Mình vừa ăn lần đầu hôm qua thôi mà đã siêu thích đồ ăn, không gian và cách phục vụ ở đây luôn. Cá hồi rất tươi, topping cũng rất ngon nữa, bọn mình còn được refill cơm và rau thêm nên 2 đứa kêu 1 phần mà ăn xong no lắm. Quán để lại ấn tượng siêu tốt cho mình và cả bạn mình nữa
Đồ ăn ngon, giá tốt, quán đẹp
Quán decor xinh, đồ ăn ngon, giá hơi cao nhưng bù lại chất lượng, dàn staff phục vụ khác nice. Sẽ quay lại …
Không gian quán đẹp, đồ ăn ngon, nhiều loại base và topping để lựa, ăn no, vì đồ chọn xong trộn nên nhanh, nhóm mình ăn xong vừa kịp giờ xem phim.

I tried the food here at Poke Saigon today and it was a wonderful experience!. The food was delicious with so many textures and flavors,it tasted amazing and the decorations were very well done.i spoke to a member of staff and she was extremely helpful and nice. 10/10 will be coming back soon!.great food guys!
Been here many times since 2019 and it's always nice. The staff is lovely, especially Vy. The brown rice here is another new level of brown rice here.
My favorite poke resto in 3 years but not anymore!!; ; The food tastes very good but they often run out some sorts of topping/protein …
Quán chi nhánh lý tự trọng. Nằm trên lầu 1 của chung cư. Không gian không quá rộng. Vệ sinh sạch sẽ. Đồ ăn ngon. Giá thuộc tầm trung và cao
Ăn ngon nha, tuy giá hơi chát tí
I’ve been to Poke D1 twice and both times were amazing. They provide friendly service with fresh meals here. The place itself is cute too. Highly recommend
Từng là khách hàng mua nhiều lần của quán. Nhưng càng ngày càng tệ giá mắc hơn so với các quán khác nhưng không đạt yêu cầu, đồ ăn ít sẽ không bao giờ quay lại
Really nice place for a poke bowl in saigon. super fresh ingredients. Great staff too, especially Vy, she was super helpful and very polite. Will definitely be back
Nhân viên nhiệt tình lắm lun, chất lượng đồ ăn ngon không bị nhạt. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại và gắn bó lâu dài với Poke.
This hidden restaurant just blow up my mind tbh. From the tropical vibe to lovely staff, not mention the poke bowl fill up with fresh colorful ingredients! Full energy for whole day long !!!
Cảm ơn Poke Sài gòn nhé. Tối thứ Bảy thật tuyệt vời với không gian quán sạch sẽ, lịch sự. Food and Drinks so good.; Thanks all
Hôm nay mình ăn thử Poke thì nhân viên ở đây hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình luôn ạ, mọi người ai cũng vui vẻ, dễ thương ấy ạ. Còn về đồ ăn thì khá chất lượng, rất ngon luôn ạ.

Món ăn ngon, có cả nước ép. Giá cả phải chăng. Không gian của quán rộng, sáng. Có duy nhất 1 điều mình đã mong cải thiện đó là cách thức gọi món. Cách hiện tại rất chậm và ảnh hưởng hơn khi đông khách, chổ chọn món cũng ngày sát cửa. Có thể quán sẽ chuyển sang hình thức order qua thiết bị thông minh.
Ngon quá trời lun, giá cả hợp lí, đồ ăn chất lượng, với cả không gian quán siêu thoáng siêu sáng sủa …
Quán đông, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, đồ ăn tự chọn như buffet (cơm+salad+topping cá hồi, ngừ, bạch tuộc,....) rất ngon. Mình sẽ quay lại ^^
Đồ ăn rất ngon , sạch sẽ . Nhân viên phục vụ cực kỳ vui vẻ vừa cái bụng mình
Rất ngon và không bị ngán. Rất tốt cho sức khoẻ. Đồ ăn tươi vị ngon. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại  …

Fantastic salads! "Poke" is Hawaiian for raw fish (salmon and tuna), but that's not the point of the Poke restaurant. They take a bowl, fill it with rice or lettuce and other fresh chopped vegetables, then top it with cold fish or tofu. …
The best place to eat in Ho Chi Minh! Amazing fresh, tasty, nutritious food served with a warm welcoming smile. Couldn't recommend this place more.  …
Đồ ăn dơ dáy, ruồi nhặng, kém vệ sinh, nhân viên mất dạy tệ nói năng hỗn xược với khách hàng, làm đồ ăn lâu chờ 1 tiếng mới tới lượt.
Đồ ăn rất ngon, trải nghiệm vô cùng xứng đáng tại đây, mình rất thích quán này.
Không gian thoáng, món ăn ngon
Quán khó tìm. Giá không rẻ. Không sử dụng dịch vụ, vào 5 phút ra mất phí gửi xe 10k
I got recommended by a friend and tried it for the first time. The food was amazing, so were the staff - super helpful.; Highly recommend!
Best Poke I’ve had since I’ve left NZ! Fresh ingredients and friendly staff and great ambiance. Will be back soon :)
phục vụ quá tệ, có vài món hết nên tụi mình chọn hơi lâu, nhân viên thái độ ra mặt
Chất lượng tốt, giá hợp lý, không gian rộng, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Chỉ có quy trình gọi món là còn nhiều khó khăn, nhất là những lúc giờ cao điểm

Lần đầu tiên mình trải nghiệm ở chi nhánh này và sẽ không có lần thứ 2. Điểm cộng là đồ ăn rất ngon, nhưng mình cảm giác thái độ của 1 bạn nhân viên bán cho tụi mình rất cộc cằn và khó chịu. Thật sự ăn ko vô 1 chút nào :))
Nhà hàng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Nhân viên nice, quầy đồ ăn đẹp và ngon. Thích trứng cút của poke
The ingredients and fish are fresh, the bowl are very pretty with colorful. Staff and service 10/10
Lovely place with such delicious food. Green plants, colorful juice bottles, chilling music. Highly recommend
Đồ ăn ngon, cá tươi, không gian rộng thoáng và trang trí đẹp.
Tuyệt vời chất lượng đồ ăn sạch sẽ đẹp mắt hấp dẫn giá cả hợp lý giá cả phù hợp với thị trường 🫶 …
Nhân viên thân thiện, poke ăn rất vừa miệng. Quán khá xinh và không gian khá yên tĩnh. Nói chung là rất hài lòng!
Good quality, great service, I'll be back.
giá hơi cao nhưng mình là người rất thích ăn món ăn của poke, vừa thú vị, vừa ngon, và healthy
Nguyên liệu tươi, nhiều gia vị và sốt; ăn thay đổi không bị ngán. Best hideaway place, also.
Really good Poké! Really adorable owners. Avoid midday in the week though - can get very busy with lunch crowd.
đồ ăn tươi và ngon, các bạn nhân viên phục rất nhiệt tình
Thức ăn ngon hấp dẫn, nhân viên phục vụ hỗ trợ nhiệt tình chu đáo
In saigon for 3 years, and still go (or order) from this place every week! keep it fresh and healthy!
Very good, delicious. Never disappoints me. Always love to eat at poke
Quán khá đông. Poke đầy ú ụ, không quá mắc nhưng thanh toán bằng thẻ hơi lỗi
Fresh and healthy, good taste, nice staff, this lovely restaurant is a must to go
Nhân viên thân thiện, quán dễ thương đồ ăn ngon
Không gian đẹp, quán ngon, nhưng giá thức ăn và thức uống cao
The vegetarian poke bowl was so good! Friendly staff members as well.
The foods was great with reasonable price. Highly recommend!
Such a delicious lunch, with fresh ingredients and nice/helpful staff
Amazing food, very healthy, delicious and great service
Ngon nha, cbi trước dưới 200k 1 phần :)))

Đồ ăn tươi ngon, phong phú, đẹp mắt.
Có 1 cái góc có giếng trời nắng chiếu xinh lắm :3
Bland food,  rude staff. A waste of a meal in a city of amazing food.

Delicious and fresh! Ambiance is also so nice
Really fresh food, great ambiance and nice staff!
Super fresh & delicious. Have been a fan for years
